footer.hours: Open everyday 12:00-10:00PM • 331 Moody St., Waltham, MA, 02453

hero.title: Angel Tea
hero.description: To bring happiness, love, and growth every day through delicious meals and creative beverages.

about.title: Our Story
about.description_1: Angel Tea is a highly rated cafe on Moody Street in Waltham, serving high-quality bubble tea, delicious desserts, and authentic homestyle Chinese food. We pride ourselves on fresh ingredients and creating drinks and dishes that bring people together.
about.description_2: Founded in 2022 by owner Angel Zhao (Brandeis '25), the cafe has quickly earned a loyal local following with a 4.7★ rating on Google. Our values of happiness and love guide everything we do.

testimonials.title: What guests say
testimonials.quote_1: I got one of their top 10 drinks, Mango Pomelo Sago Slush. It was amazing, really hit the spot from the first sip.
testimonials.quote_2: Angel Tea offers a unique blend of exquisite tea selections and authentic Chinese dishes. The welcoming atmosphere and friendly staff make every visit feel special.
testimonials.quote_3: Angel Tea maintains a 4.7 out of 5 star rating on Google, reflecting widespread customer satisfaction with its flavors and service.

visit.title: Visit Angel Tea
visit.parking_info: Street parking available; accessible spot nearby.
visit.accessibility_info: Wheelchair-accessible entrance and restroom; gender-neutral restroom.

hours.q: What are your hours of operation?
hours.a: We are open every day from 12:00 PM to 10:00 PM.

delivery.q: Do you offer delivery or online ordering?
delivery.a: Yes, we offer takeout and dine-in, and delivery via DoorDash, Grubhub, and Uber Eats.

parking.a: Street parking is available on Moody Street, with public lots nearby and an accessible spot close to the shop.

accessibility.a: Yes. Our entrance and restroom are wheelchair-accessible, and seating accommodates mobility devices.

dietary.q: Do you have non-dairy or vegan options?
dietary.a: Many fruit teas contain no dairy, and we have non-dairy alternatives for milk teas. Some food items are vegan-friendly.

justice.title: Moody Street's best bubble tea shop is run by a Brandeis junior
